description.name: Blend Dark Mode
description.tagline: This module adds a dark mode for WHMCS admin theme Blend. To enable the dark UI, simply Activate the addon, and to disable the dark mode, simple Deactivate the addon.
description.long: This module adds a dark mode for WHMCS admin theme Blend. To enable the dark UI, simply Activate the addon, and to disable the dark mode, simple Deactivate the addon.
features: Easily add a dark UI to the Blend admin theme.
